# Nebula Graph Log4j配置 # 设置日志级别和输出格式
# 根logger配置 log4j.rootLogger=INFO, console, file
# 控制台输出配置 log4j.appender.console=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender log4j.appender.console.Target=System.out log4j.appender.console.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.console.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# 文件输出配置 log4j.appender.file=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.file.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/nebula.log log4j.appender.file.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.file.MaxBackupIndex=10 log4j.appender.file.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.file.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# 错误日志单独输出 log4j.appender.errorfile=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.errorfile.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/nebula-error.log log4j.appender.errorfile.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.errorfile.MaxBackupIndex=5 log4j.appender.errorfile.Threshold=ERROR log4j.appender.errorfile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.errorfile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# Graphd特定日志配置 log4j.logger.graphd=INFO, graphdfile log4j.additivity.graphd=false
log4j.appender.graphdfile=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.graphdfile.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/graphd.log log4j.appender.graphdfile.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.graphdfile.MaxBackupIndex=10 log4j.appender.graphdfile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.graphdfile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# Metad特定日志配置 log4j.logger.metad=INFO, metadfile log4j.additivity.metad=false
log4j.appender.metadfile=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.metadfile.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/metad.log log4j.appender.metadfile.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.metadfile.MaxBackupIndex=10 log4j.appender.metadfile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.metadfile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# Storaged特定日志配置 log4j.logger.storaged=INFO, storagedfile log4j.additivity.storaged=false
log4j.appender.storagedfile=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.storagedfile.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/storaged.log log4j.appender.storagedfile.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.storagedfile.MaxBackupIndex=10 log4j.appender.storagedfile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.storagedfile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# 性能日志配置 log4j.logger.performance=INFO, perffile log4j.additivity.performance=false
log4j.appender.perffile=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.perffile.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/performance.log log4j.appender.perffile.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.perffile.MaxBackupIndex=5 log4j.appender.perffile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.perffile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# 审计日志配置 log4j.logger.audit=INFO, auditfile log4j.additivity.audit=false
log4j.appender.auditfile=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.auditfile.File={{nebula_log_dir}}/audit.log log4j.appender.auditfile.MaxFileSize=100MB log4j.appender.auditfile.MaxBackupIndex=10 log4j.appender.auditfile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.auditfile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n
# 减少第三方库的日志噪音 log4j.logger.org.apache.http=WARN log4j.logger.org.apache.commons=WARN log4j.logger.org.eclipse.jetty=WARN
